div.head: To the many thousands of Professors of CHRISTS Religion in all places in this Kingdome.
div.p: Brethren, bee not Children in vnderstanding, howbeit in Malice bee yee Children, but in Vnderstanding bee Men.
So teacheth you the holy Apostle, so aduiseth, exhorteth, and prayeth for you all. A helper of your Faith, and a Seruant of your soules in CHRIST IESVS.
